edu.uga.cs1302.list

Class SimpleLinkedList<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs1302.list.SimpleLinkedList<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleList<E>, Serializable, Iterable<E>

    public class SimpleLinkedList<E>
extends Object
implements SimpleList<E>, Iterable<E>, Serializable
    This class provides a simple generic list implmented as a doubly linked list. It is similar to the LinkedList class included in the java.util package. The elements on the list are ordered, and the first element of the list is at position 0 and the last element is at position list.size() - 1.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean add(int index,

        Returns:
        true if e is added
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the supplied index is out of bounds i.e., if index "<" 0 or index ">" size(). If index is equal to size(), the new element is added at the end of the list (it's appended).
